name: Writer for Figma
description:
Writer | Clear, consistent, on-brand copy | Checks grammar + spelling 



Writer is the AI writing assistant for teams. Use the Writer + Figma plugin to make sure all your content is clear, consistent, and error-free.


This plugin checks your content for:

✅ Spelling

✅ Grammar

✅ Readability / grade level

✅ Punctuation errors

✅ Stats: Reading time, word count, sentence length


You will require a Writer subscription to sign into the plugin. A free plan gives you basic spelling and grammar suggestions, and the Pro plan ($99/year) gives you advanced writing suggestions and writing style customizations.


Contact us at hello@writer.com for Team plans that also give you access to a content design system, product taxonomy tools, and collaboration features.
